body_html:
@Mazecreator - how did you configure your build using the configure script? Can you paste the output with the values you entered for CUDA version, etc.?

Also, what are the contents of the directory bazel-tensorflow/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool, including all directories?
body_text:
@Mazecreator - how did you configure your build using the configure script? Can you paste the output with the values you entered for CUDA version, etc.?
Also, what are the contents of the directory bazel-tensorflow/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool, including all directories?
body:
@Mazecreator - how did you configure your build using the `configure` script? Can you paste the output with the values you entered for CUDA version, etc.?

Also, what are the contents of the directory `bazel-tensorflow/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool`, including all directories?
